entries.title: Web Developer
entries.description: Develops cloud-based enterprise web apps and assists with engineering and architectural decisions when needed. Managed development of a mobile app on a nascent framework, as well as led the company’s push to more internal automation with Azure cloud services.

entries.title: Software Development Intern
entries.description: Learned about developing and maintaining ASP.NET web applications. Also developed a new site built on .NET Core, leading the company’s transition to a new stack.

entries.title: R&D Lab Assistant
entries.description: Assisted with the research and development phase of a new consumer electronics product by writing prototype software and testing hardware.

entries.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
entries.subtitle: Minor in Mathematics

entries.title: Study Abroad
entries.location: Norwegian University of Science and Technologh (Trondheim, Norway)
